item.title: ID-41 South at I-90 - Interstate Trucks
item.description: ID-41 south approaching I-90. All Interstate trucks must be weighed at Port of Entry on I-90 East.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 7
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 7 - ID-41/Rathdrum/Spirit Lake.

item.title: I-90 West - Exits 7 and 6
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 7 - ID-41/Rathdrum/Spirit Lake. Approaching Exit 6 - BL-90/Seltice Way/City Center.

item.title: US-2 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on US-2 west at ID-41 jct. Use ID-41 south for Spirit Lake and Coeur d’Alene. US-2 west for Newport and Spokane.

item.title: US-2 East at Idaho Border - Signed As ID-41
item.description: ID-41 signage on US-2 approaching the Idaho state line. Approaching ID-41 jct., although this sign does not specify that.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41north at US-2 - west to Newport/City Center; east to Priest River/Sandpoint. ID-41 is the dividing line between Washington and Idaho.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41 north at US-2. ID-41 through Oldtown is on the state line. The east side of the street is in Idaho; the west side in Washington.

item.title: End ID-54 West at ID-41
item.description: End ID-54 west at ID-41. Use ID-41 north for Spirit Lake and Newport (WA). Use ID-41 south for Rathdrum.

item.title: ID-41 North Approaching ID-54
item.description: ID-41 north approaching ID-54 east to Athol.

item.title: ID-53 East at ID-41
item.description: ID-53 east at ID-41 junction. ID-53 east traffic turns right here. ID-41 north traffic continue straight.

item.title: ID-53 East Approaching ID-41
item.description: ID-53 east approaching ID-41/ID-53 to Sandpoint and ID-41 north to Spirit Lake and Newport (WA).

item.title: I-90 East Exit 7
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 7 - ID-41/Rathdrum/Spirit Lake
